long_description: Mount this versatile rod holder on your watercraft to free your hands--it can even be used to troll with a canoe, kayak or sit-on-top. Holds a fishing pole equipped with either a bait casting reel or spinning reel. Fully adjustable up and down, plus it rotates 360deg and tilts fully upright for rod storage when traveling. Rod can be secured in holder with a soft latching strap that snaps over top of rod. Slot in the front of the rod holder allows for a spinning reel to be securely held in position. Side-mount flange leaves the bottom open, allowing rod holder to accommodate trigger sticks. Pistol-grip rod butts easily clear the sides for quick rod retrieval. Includes combination deck or side mount and installation instructions. Bolting dimensions: 1-5/16 x 3-3/16 inches.
